body_html:
TensorFlow GPU reductions use mixed inputs -- op is on GPU, input tensor is GPU, reduction indices are on CPU using host memory attribute

from /core/kernels/reduction_ops_min.cc

#define REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(type)          \
  REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(                  \
      Name("Min")                           \
          .Device(DEVICE_GPU)               \
          .TypeConstraint<type>("T")        \
          .TypeConstraint<int32>("Tidx")    \
          .HostMemory("reduction_indices"), \
      ReductionOp<GPUDevice, type, Eigen::internal::MinReducer<type>>);
REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(float);
REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(double);

body:
TensorFlow GPU reductions use mixed inputs -- op is on GPU, input tensor is GPU, reduction indices are on CPU using host memory attribute

from /core/kernels/reduction_ops_min.cc
```
#define REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(type)          \
  REGISTER_KERNEL_BUILDER(                  \
      Name("Min")                           \
          .Device(DEVICE_GPU)               \
          .TypeConstraint<type>("T")        \
          .TypeConstraint<int32>("Tidx")    \
          .HostMemory("reduction_indices"), \
      ReductionOp<GPUDevice, type, Eigen::internal::MinReducer<type>>);
REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(float);
REGISTER_GPU_KERNELS(double);

```
